divs: Sighting Detailsi walked out my back door to pee and noticed a brighter than usual plane coming toward me so i kept watching and then i noticed it looked like 2 planes one on top of the other, as it got closer i realized this was not a common airplane profile. most planes have about 4 lights this object had at least 12. also i think it was about 2 times taller than a commercial airliner. it was moving over 200 miles an hour. then i thoght this must be a blimp so the next day i got on the enternet and found out most blimps top speed is 40 mph.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Alton
There were no other sightings in Alton on or around August 28th 2013
Summary: thought it was a plane till it got closer then noticed it was a taller profile
